file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 25-23-04-04 - MAIN-DOOR LINING PANELS - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL MAIN-DOOR LINING PANELS - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove/install the main-door lining panels. B. The main-door lining panels are installed on the passenger entry/exit door. C. The main-door lining panel assembly includes electrical installations, microswitch shrouds, and several trim covers. D. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 25-23-04-000-801-A MAIN-DOOR LINING PANEL - REMOVAL MAIN-DOOR LINING PANEL - INSTALLA- ALL 25-23-04-400-801-A TION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 25-23-04 Page 1 of 17 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-23-04-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. MAIN-DOOR LINING PANEL - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the main-door lining panels. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM SDS 52-10-00/1 MAIN-DOOR STEP-TREAD LINING PANEL - REMOV- AMM TASK 52-10-02-000-801-A/400 AL MAIN DOOR INTERNAL ACTUATING-HANDLE - RE- AMM TASK 52-11-01-000-801-A/400 MOVAL AMM TASK 52-11-04-000-801-A/400 MAIN-DOOR FOLDING FLAP - REMOVAL SIDE-HINGED MAIN-DOOR FOLDING FLAP - REMOV- AMM TASK 52-18-03-000-801-A/400 AL SIDE-HINGED MAIN-DOOR INTERNAL ACTUATING AMM TASK 52-18-05-000-801-A/400 HANDLE - REMOVAL S.B.145-25-0161 - S.B.145-52-0005 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the MAIN DOOR 1 (Location Tip: DC BUS 1/ MISCELLANEOUS/MAIN DOOR 1) and MAIN DOOR 2 (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 2/HOT BUS 2/MAIN DOOR 2) circuit breakers. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 25-23-04 Page 2 of 17 Rev 55 - Oct 29/18 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) Open the main door (AMM SDS 52-10-00/1). J. Removal (Figure 401) (Figure 402) (Figure 403) SUBTASK 020-002-A CAUTION: • SOME LINERS OF THE MAIN-DOOR ARE FRAGILE, LARGE AND DIFFICULT TO MOVE. • BE CAREFUL NOT TO SCRATCH OUT THE PAINTING OF THE MAIN DOOR. (1) For aircraft with airstairs doors and PRE-MOD. S.B.145-25-0161, remove the main- door lining panels as follows (Figure 401): (a) Use a support to lift the main door. Refer to DET. A. NOTE: The support prevents damage to the main door and makes its removal easier. (b) Release the end of the springs (41) from the door structure. Refer to VIEW E, sheet 2. (c) Remove the screws (2) and washers (3) to release the upper forward trim cover (1). Refer to DET. B, sheet 1. (d) Remove the screws (5) and washers (6) to release the forward trim cover (4). Refer to DET. B, sheet 1. (e) Remove the main-door internal actuating handle (AMM TASK 52-11-01-000-801- A/400). (f) Remove the screws (8) and washers (9) to release the upper aft trim cover 1 (7). Refer to DET. C, sheet 1. (g) Remove the screws (11) and washers (12) to release the upper aft trim cover 2 (10). Refer to DET. C, sheet 1. (h) Remove the screws (17) and washers (18) that attach the microswitch shroud (16). Refer to DET. C, Sheet 1. (i) Remove the screws (14) and washers (15) that attach the aft trim cover (13). Refer to DET. C, Sheet 1. (j) Remove the main-door steptread lining panel (AMM TASK 52-10-02-000-801-A/ 400). (k) Disconnect the rod ends from the support at the folding flap ( AMM TASK 52-11-04-000-801-A/400). (l) Remove the screws (35) and washers (36) to release the trim cover assembly (37). Refer to DET. D, sheet 2. (m) Remove the screws (33) and washers (34) that attach the courtesy-light center trim cover (32) to the main-door courtesy-light cover assembly (19). Refer to DET. D, sheet 2. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 25-23-04 Page 3 of 17 Rev 55 - Oct 29/18 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (n) Remove the screws (31) and washers (30) to release the courtesy-light center trim cover (32). Refer to DET. D, sheet 2. (o) Remove the main-door courtesy-light cover assembly (19). Refer to DET. D, sheet 2. (p) Disconnect the electrical connectors (20). Refer to DET. D, sheet 2. (q) Remove the screws (39) and washers (38) that attach the bottom trim cover (40). Refer to DET. D, sheet 2. (r) Remove the screws (22) and washers (21) to release the trim cover side support 1 (23). Refer to DET. D, sheet 2. (s) Remove the screws (28) and washers (29) to release the trim cover side support 2 (27). Refer to DET. D, sheet 2. (t) Remove the screws (26) and washers (25) to release the upper trim cover (24). Refer to DET. D, sheet 2. (2) For aircraft POST-MOD. S.B.145-25-0161, remove the main-door lining panels as follows (Figure 402): (a) Release the end of the springs (51) from the door structure. Refer to VIEW E, sheet 2. (b) Remove the screws (6) and washers (7) to release the upper forward trim cover (8). Refer to DET. B, sheet 1. (c) Remove the screws (9) and washers (10) to release the forward trim cover assembly 2 (5). Refer to DET. B, sheet 1. (d) Remove the screws (2) and washers (3) to release the lock box cover 1 (1). Refer to DET. B, sheet 1. (e) Remove the screws (11) and washers (12) to release the forward trim cover assembly 1 (4). Refer to DET. B, sheet 1. (f) Remove the main-door internal actuating handle (AMM TASK 52-11-01-000-801- A/400). (g) Remove the screws (15) and washers (16) to release the upper aft trim cover 1 (14). Refer to DET. C, sheet 1. (h) Remove the screws (18) and washers (19) to release the upper aft trim cover 2 (17). Refer to DET. C, sheet 1. (i) Remove the screws (21) and washers (22) to release the aft trim cover assembly 1 (20). Refer to DET. C, sheet 1. (j) Remove the aft trim cover assembly 3 (13). Refer to DET. C, sheet 1. (k) Remove the screws (24) and washers (25) to release the lock box cover 2 (23). Refer to DET. C, sheet 1. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 25-23-04 Page 4 of 17 Rev 55 - Oct 29/18 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (l) Remove the screws (26) and washers (27) to release the aft trim cover assembly 2 (28). Refer to DET. C, sheet 1. (m) Remove the main-door steptread lining panel (AMM TASK 52-10-02-000-801-A/ 400). (n) Disconnect the rod ends from the support at the folding flap ( AMM TASK 52-11-04-000-801-A/400). (o) Remove the screws (45) and washers (46) to release the trim cover assembly (47). Refer to DET. D, sheet 2. (p) Remove the screws (43) and washers (44) that attach the courtesy-light center trim cover (42) to the main-door courtesy-light cover assembly (29). Refer to DET. D, sheet 2. (q) Remove the screws (41) and washers (40) to release the courtesy-light center trim cover (42). Refer to DET. D, sheet 2. (r) Remove the main-door courtesy-light cover assembly (29). Refer to DET. D, sheet 2. (s) Disconnect the electrical connectors (30). Refer to DET. D, sheet 2. (t) Remove the screws (49) and washers (48) that attach the bottom trim cover (50). Refer to DET. D, sheet 2. (u) Remove the screws (32) and washers (31) to release the trim cover side support 1 (33). Refer to DET. D, sheet 2. (v) Remove the screws (38) and washers (39) to release the trim cover side support 2 (37). Refer to DET. D, sheet 2. (w) Remove the screws (36) and washers (35) to release the upper trim cover (34). Refer to DET. D, sheet 2. (3) For aircraft with side-hinged main-door or POST-MOD. S.B.145-52-0005, remove the main-door lining panels as follows (Figure 403): (a) Remove the arm trim cover (8). Refer to DET. B, sheet 1. This part is attached with Velcro fasteners. (b) Pull and remove the locking pins (12). Refer to DET. D, sheet 2. (c) Remove the retaining pin (11). Refer to DET. D, sheet 2. (d) Remove the door handle (13). Refer to DET. D, sheet 2. (e) Remove the main-door emergency light cover (9). Refer to DET. C, sheet 2. This part is attached with Velcro fasteners. NOTE: Be careful not to cause damage to the emergency light wire. (f) Disconnect the electrical connector (10). Refer to DET. C, sheet 2. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 25-23-04 Page 5 of 17 Rev 55 - Oct 29/18 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (g) Remove the screws (6) and washers (2) to release the main door lining (7). Refer to DET. B, sheet 1. (h) Remove the side-hinged main-door internal actuating handle (AMM TASK 52-18-05-000-801-A/400). (i) Remove the screws (14) to release the assistance handle (15). Refer to DET. B, sheet 1. (j) Remove the screws (5) and washers (4) to release the main-door lining (3). Refer to DET. B, sheet 1. (k) Disconnect the rod ends from the support at the folding flap (AMM TASK 52-18-03-000-801-A/400). (l) Remove the trim cover assembly (1). Refer to DET. B, sheet 1. This part is attached with Velcro fasteners. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 25-23-04 Page 6 of 17 Rev 55 - Oct 29/18 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-23-04-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. MAIN-DOOR LINING PANEL - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the main-door lining panel. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM SDS 52-10-00/1 MAIN-DOOR STEP-TREAD LINING PANEL - INSTAL- AMM TASK 52-10-02-400-801-A/400 LATION MAIN DOOR INTERNAL ACTUATING HANDLE - IN- AMM TASK 52-11-01-400-801-A/400 STALLATION AMM TASK 52-11-04-400-801-A/400 MAIN-DOOR FOLDING FLAP - INSTALLATION SIDE-HINGED MAIN-DOOR FOLDING FLAP - INSTAL- AMM TASK 52-18-03-400-801-A/400 LATION SIDE-HINGED MAIN-DOOR INTERNAL ACTUATING AMM TASK 52-18-05-400-801-A/400 HANDLE - INSTALLATION S.B.145-25-0161 - S.B.145-52-0005 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin I. Installation (Figure 401) (Figure 402) (Figure 403) SUBTASK 420-002-A EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 25-23-04 Page 13 of 17 Rev 55 - Oct 29/18 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL CAUTION: • SOME LINERS OF THE MAIN-DOOR ARE FRAGILE, LARGE AND DIFFICULT TO MOVE. • BE CAREFUL NOT TO SCRATCH OUT THE PAINTING OF THE MAIN DOOR. (1) For aircraft with airstairs main-door and PRE-MOD. S.B.145-25-0161, install the main- door lining panels as follows (Figure 401): (a) Use a support to lift the main door. Refer to DET. A. NOTE: The support prevents damage to the main door and makes its installation easier. (b) Install the upper trim cover (24) with the screws (26) and washers (25). Refer to DET. D, sheet 2. (c) Install the trim cover side support 2 (27) with the screws (28) and washers (29). Refer to DET. D, sheet 2. (d) Install the trim cover side support 1 (23) with the screws (22) and washers (21). Refer to DET. D, sheet 2. (e) Install the bottom trim cover (40) with the screws (39) and washers (38).Refer to DET. D, sheet 2. (f) Connect the electrical connectors (20). Refer to DET. D, sheet 2. (g) Put the main-door courtesy-light cover assembly (19) in its correct position. Refer to DET. D, sheet 2. (h) Install the courtesy-light center trim cover (32) to the main-door courtesy-light cover assembly (19) with the screws (35) and washers (36). Refer to DET. D, sheet 2. (i) Install the courtesy-light center trim cover (32) with the screws (31) and washers (30). Refer to DET. D, sheet 2. (j) Install the trim cover assembly (37) and attach with the screws (35) and washers (36). Refer to DET. D, sheet 2. (k) Connect the rod end to the support at the folding flap ( AMM TASK 52-11-04-400-801-A/400). (l) Install the main-door steptread lining panel (AMM TASK 52-10-02-400-801-A/ 400). (m) Install the aft trim cover (13) and attach with the screws (14) and washers (15). Refer to DET. C, sheet 1. (n) Install the microswitch shroud (16) with the screws (17) and washers (18). Refer to DET. C, sheet 1. (o) Install the upper aft trim cover 2 (10) with the screws (11) and washers (12). Refer to DET. C, sheet 1. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 25-23-04 Page 14 of 17 Rev 55 - Oct 29/18 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (p) Install the upper aft trim cover 1 (7) with the screws (8) and washers (9). Refer to DET. C, sheet 1. (q) Install the main-door internal actuating handle (AMM TASK 52-11-01-400-801-A/ 400). (r) Install the forward trim cover assembly (4) with the screws (5) and washers (6). Refer to DET. B, sheet 1. (s) Install the upper forward trim cover (1) with the screws (2) and washers (3). Refer to DET. B, sheet 1. (t) Attach the end of the springs (41) to the door structure. Refer to VIEW E, sheet 2. (2) For aircraft with airstairs main-door and POST-MOD. S.B.145-25-0161, install the main-door lining panels as follows (Figure 402): (a) Install the upper trim cover (34) with the screws (36) and washers (35). Refer to DET. D, sheet 2. (b) Install the trim cover side support 2 (37) with the screws (38) and washers (39). Refer to DET. D, sheet 2. (c) Install the trim cover side support 1 (33) with the screws (32) and washers (31). Refer to DET. D, sheet 2. (d) Install the bottom trim cover (50) with the screws (49) and washers (48). Refer to DET. D, sheet 2. (e) Connect the electrical connectors (30). Refer to DET. D, sheet 2. (f) Put the main-door courtesy-light cover assembly (29) in its correct position. Refer to DET. D, sheet 2. (g) Install the courtesy-light center trim cover (42) to the main-door courtesy-light cover assembly (29) with the screws (43) and washers (44). Refer to DET. D, sheet 2. (h) Install the courtesy-light center trim cover (42) with the screws (41) and washers (40). Refer to DET. D, sheet 2. (i) Install the trim cover assembly (47) and attach with the screws (45) and washers (46). Refer to DET. D, sheet 2. (j) Connect the rod end to the support at the folding flap ( AMM TASK 52-11-04-400-801-A/400). (k) Install the main-door steptread lining panel (AMM TASK 52-10-02-400-801-A/ 400). (l) Install the aft trim cover assembly 2 (28) and attach with the screws (26) and washers (27). Refer to DET. C, sheet 1. (m) Install the lock box cover 2 (23) and attach with the screws (24) and washers (25). Refer to DET. C, sheet 1. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 25-23-04 Page 15 of 17 Rev 55 - Oct 29/18 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (n) Install the aft trim cover assembly 3 (13). Refer to DET. C, sheet 1. (o) Install the aft trim cover assembly 1 (20) and attach with the screws (21) and washers (22). Refer to DET. C, sheet 1. (p) Install the upper aft trim cover 2 (17) and attach with the screws (18) and washers (19). Refer to DET. C, sheet 1. (q) Install the upper aft trim cover 1 (14) and attach with the screws (15) and washers (16). Refer to DET. C, sheet 1. (r) Install the main-door internal actuating handle (AMM TASK 52-11-01-400-801-A/ 400). (s) Install the forward trim cover assembly 1 (4) and attach with the screws (11) and washers (12). Refer to DET. B, sheet 1. (t) Install the lock box cover 1 (1) and attach with the screws (2) and washers (3). Refer to DET. B, sheet 1. (u) Install the forward trim cover assembly 2 (5) and attach with the screws (9) and washers (10). Refer to DET. B, sheet 1. (v) Install the upper forward trim cover (8) and attach with the screws (6) and washers (7). Refer to DET. B, sheet 1. (w) Attach the end of the springs (51) to the door structure. Refer to VIEW E, sheet 2. (3) For aircraft with side-hinged main-door or POST-MOD. S.B.145-52-0005, install the main-door lining panels as follows (Figure 403): (a) Attach the trim cover assembly (1). Refer to DET. B, sheet 1. (b) Connect the rod ends to the support at the folding flap (AMM TASK 52-18-03-400-801-A/400). (c) Install the main door lining (3). Attach it with the screws (5) and washers (4). Refer to DET. B, sheet 1. (d) Install the assistance handle (15). Attach it with the screws (14). Refer to DET. B, sheet 1. (e) Install the side-hinged main-door internal actuating handle (AMM TASK 52-18-05-400-801-A/400). (f) Install the main door lining (7). Attach it with the screws (6) and washers (2). Refer to DET. B, sheet 1. (g) Connect the electrical connector (10). Refer to DET. C, sheet 2. (h) Install the main-door emergency light cover (9). Refer to DET. C, sheet 2. (i) Set the door handle (13). Refer to DET. D, sheet 2. (j) Install the retaining pin (11) and attach with the locking pins (12). Refer to DET. D, sheet 2. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 25-23-04 Page 16 of 17 Rev 55 - Oct 29/18 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (k) Install the arm trim cover (8). Refer to DET. B, sheet 1. J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Close the main door (AMM SDS 52-10-00/1). (2) On the circuit breaker panel, close the MAIN DOOR 1 (Location Tip: DC BUS 1/ MISCELLANEOUS/MAIN DOOR 1) and MAIN DOOR 2 (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 2/HOT BUS 2/MAIN DOOR 2) circuit breakers. (3) Do a check to see that the emergency light is O.K. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 25-23-04 Page 17 of 17 Rev 55 - Oct 29/18 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
